body_html:
I just switched to master branch and it seems to work (still building). I just wanted to install an updated version of tensorflow.
I tried with pip and it downloaded a version 1.5 but required cuda 9 and I didn't to update to cuda9.1 (which would require updating ubuntu version too).

body:
I just switched to master branch and it  seems to work (still building). I just wanted to install an updated version of tensorflow.
I tried with pip and it downloaded a version 1.5 but required cuda 9 and  I didn't to update to cuda9.1 (which would require updating ubuntu version too).
